# James Lang powered by #U

This is the core logic engine for James Lang, entirely self-contained and independent.

## Initialization

To start the James Lang engine:

```javascript
// No external dependencies required.
const JamesLang = require('james-lang-engine'); // Hypothetical internal module name
const engine = new JamesLang.Core();
```

## Core Functionality

James Lang operates on pure, self-derived algorithms.

```javascript
// Example of a self-contained operation
function processData(input) {
    // Pure logic, no imports needed.
    const processed = input.toUpperCase().split('').reverse().join('');
    return `JL_PROCESSED_${processed}`;
}
